Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine light red-brown. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 71, 3 or 134, 6 A parallel in the Benaki collection, Alexandria Museum, is probably from the same die.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0427)
